title: 游戏加载之后出现错误了
author: windwife
txt_content:
---- Minecraft Crash Report ----

WARNING: coremods are present:
  TabIconHackForgeLoadingPlugin ([头像破解]TabIconHackForge-1.0.jar)
  CorePlugin ([平滑字体]SmoothFont-1.12.2-1.15.jar)
  ForgePlugin ([皮肤补丁]CustomSkinLoader_Forge-14.7.jar)
  MZZLoadingPlugin ([启动加速]MakeZoomZoom-0.0.4.jar)
  NetherPortalFixForgeLoadingPlugin ([防卡地狱门]NetherPortalFixForge-1.0.jar)
  AppleCore ([苹果核]AppleCore-mc1.12.2-3.1.3.jar)
  JechCore ([拼音搜索]JustEnoughCharacters-1.12.0-2.3.2.jar)
  LoadingPlugin (RandomThings-MC1.12.2-4.2.5.jar)
  Do not report to Forge! Remove FoamFixAPI (or replace with FoamFixAPI-Lawful) and try again. ([泡沫修复]foamfix-0.9.9.1-1.12.2-anarchy.jar)
  CoreModBase ([查看潜影盒]ShulkerBoxViewer-1.5-mc[1.11-1.12.2].jar)
  CoreModLoader ([3D声效]Sound-Physics-1.12.2.jar)
  Inventory Tweaks Coremod ([R键整理]InventoryTweaks-1.63.jar)
Contact their authors BEFORE contacting forge

// You're mean.
Caused by: java.lang.IllegalAccessError: tried to access class net.minecraft.potion.PotionHelper$MixPredicate from class codechicken.nei.util.helper.potion.PotionRecipeHelper

Time: 2/1/19 2:21 PM
Description: There was a severe problem during mod loading that has caused the game to fail

net.minecraftforge.fml.common.LoaderExceptionModCrash: Caught exception from Not Enough Items (nei)
